name: blueprint-css
description: Blueprint CSS, Responsive CSS Layout Library

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:latest && npm run build:fallback && npm run build:legacy
scripts.build:latest: sass src/blueprint.scss dist/blueprint.css && csso dist/blueprint.css --output dist/blueprint.min.css
scripts.build:fallback: sass src/fallback/blueprint.scss dist/fallback/blueprint.css && csso dist/fallback/blueprint.css --output dist/fallback/blueprint.min.css
scripts.build:legacy: sass src/v2/blueprint.scss dist/v2/blueprint.css && csso dist/v2/blueprint.css --output dist/v2/blueprint.min.css

author: Cory Rylan
